summary: Build a marketing website for 'King Kingdom | Complete Construction Solutions' (construction company) including sections like Home, About, Services, Projects/Portfolio, Contact, with WhatsApp/call CTAs and supporting visuals/project photos.
architectural_notes: Static single-page site using HTML/CSS with responsive layout; minimal JS for WhatsApp form submission (opens wa.me with prefilled text).
Primary CTAs: Call Now (tel:) and WhatsApp (wa.me) in header and floating button; contact form routes to WhatsApp.
Use provided social links (YouTube, Facebook, Instagram) with recognizable icons in the footer; links open in a new tab with rel="noopener noreferrer".
Add a construction-themed background image to the Home/Hero section and add relevant service/work visuals across sections to elevate the design to an ultra-premium look.
known_issues: Deployment/build is failing (deployment unsuccessful) and must be resolved to deliver working results.
Logo has been removed per user request; ensure all UI references to the logo asset are removed/updated to prevent missing-asset errors and broken header branding.

existing_features.title: Create a responsive single-page marketing website for “King Kingdom | Complete Construction Solutions” that implements the provided HTML structure and section content in React + TypeScript + Tailwind (top bar, sticky header/nav, hero, highlights, about, services, portfolio/projects, why choose, process, contact, footer). All user-facing text must be in English and match the provided copy.

Implement the primary calls-to-action and contact interactions: (1) “Call Now” buttons use tel:+917734920728, (2) WhatsApp buttons open https://wa.me/917734920728 in a new tab, (3) the contact form builds a WhatsApp message from Name/Phone/Service/Message and opens https://wa.me/917734920728?text=<encoded message> in a new tab on submit.

Add and use generated visual assets to replace placeholders and elevate the site: include a brand logo/mark, a hero construction-themed visual, and real-looking project photos for all portfolio cards. Store assets as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly from the frontend (do not route images through the backend).

Apply a cohesive visual theme consistent with a premium construction brand using a navy-forward palette (no blue/purple gradients unless they are navy-based), strong typography hierarchy, card-based layout, and subtle shadows—matching the provided design intent (sticky translucent header, rounded cards, light background). Ensure consistent spacing and accessible contrast across sections.

Add the user-provided logo (from the uploaded image) as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated and update the site branding to use it consistently (at minimum in the sticky header brand area).

Add social media links to the website UI (include recognizable social icons and accessible link labels in English), and ensure links open in a new tab with rel="noopener noreferrer". Place the social links in the footer (and optionally the top bar) without changing existing phone/WhatsApp/email interactions.

Create a premium-quality, clean, centered square logo asset derived from the uploaded image IMG-20260213-WA0001.jpg, and use it as the primary site logo where the current logo is displayed (including the sticky header brand area).
Activate the provided social media links (YouTube, Facebook, Instagram) in the existing social links configuration so the footer social icons render and open the correct URLs in a new tab.

Keep using the existing logo image (/assets/generated/king-kingdom-logo-legend-legacy.dim_512x512.png) and adjust only its layout/styling in the sticky header so it looks properly set: centered, not stretched/cropped, visually aligned with the brand text, and responsive on small screens.

Create a premium-quality, clean, centered square logo image derived from the newly uploaded file IMG-20260213-WA0001-1.jpg, and use it as the primary site logo wherever the logo is displayed (including the sticky header brand area) without stretching/cropping and with crisp rendering on mobile and desktop.

Replace the current Hero/Home section background styling with a full-width construction-related photo background and a readable overlay (e.g., dark/navy scrim) so the existing hero headings and buttons remain highly legible and the section looks ultra-premium.

Add construction/work/service-related photos or premium visuals throughout the site sections (especially Services and About; Projects already has photos) so each service/work area is supported by relevant imagery and the overall website feels ultra-premium.

Diagnose and fix the current deployment/build failure so the project can be deployed successfully, and ensure the deployed app loads the King Kingdom single-page marketing site without runtime errors.

Create a premium-quality, clean, centered square logo image derived from the newly uploaded file IMG-20260213-WA0001-2.jpg, add it as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated, and update the site branding to use it as the primary logo wherever the current logo is displayed (at minimum in the sticky header brand area).
Remove the logo image from the sticky header brand area so the site displays a text-only brand ("King Kingdom" and "Complete Construction Solutions") without any logo/mark image.
Ensure there are no remaining UI references that attempt to load the removed logo asset(s), preventing broken images or console errors related to missing logo files.

Update the sticky header brand area (frontend/src/components/king-kingdom/HeaderNav.tsx) to display the new logo image alongside the existing brand text ("King Kingdom" and "Complete Construction Solutions"), ensuring the logo is not stretched or cropped and remains well-aligned and responsive on small screens.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create the King Kingdom marketing website (single-page layout with top bar, sticky nav, hero, about, services, portfolio, why choose, process, contact, footer).
Add visuals/graphics and real-looking project photos for the portfolio section (replace placeholder 'PROJECT' blocks).
Provide brand visuals (e.g., logo/mark, hero/section illustrations) consistent with the navy construction theme.
Upgrade the site to an ultra-premium look by adding construction-related photos/visuals: a construction-themed homepage background image and relevant work/service visuals throughout all sections.
Add the newly provided logo to the site branding (restore a logo image in the header/brand area and ensure it displays correctly without stretching/cropping).
Add the newly uploaded logo (download-1.webp) as a static image asset under frontend/public/assets/generated and create a crisp, centered, square logo file suitable for web use.
